maqras.text: 75|1|Ma'i sapata karaicho kbiyamatara dinara
75|2|ma'i arau sapata karaicho atmanindakarai atmara
75|3|manuhe bharae neki ye, ami ketiya'o tara asthisamuha ekatraita karaiba noraaraima
75|4|kiya noraaraima, ami tara anulira agrabhagasamuhako (pababorako) punarbin'yasta karaibalai saksama.
75|5|Baram manuhe tara bharaisyate'o papakarma karaibalai bicarae.
75|6|Si prasna karae, kiyamatara dinato ketiya ahiba
75|7|yetiya caku sthira hai yaba
75|8|arau candra kiranabihina hai paraiba
75|9|arau yetiya surya arau candraka ekatraita karaa ha’ba
75|10|se'idina manuhe ka’ba, ‘aji palabalai sthana ka’ta’
75|11|Ketiya'o nahaya, kono asrayasthala na'i.
75|12|Se'idina tha'i ha’ba kerala tomara pratipalakara ocarata.
75|13|Se'idina manuhaka arahita karaoraa ha’ba si agalai ki pathiya'ichila arau pichata ki thai ahiche.
75|14|Baram manuhe nije'i nijara bisaye samyaka aragata
75|15|yadi'o si nana ajuhata dekhuraaya.
75|16|Tatataiyakai ahi ayattba karaara babe tumi tomara jibhaka drauta sancalana nakaraiba.
75|17|Niscaya iyara samraksana arau patha karaoraara dayitba amarae'i.
75|18|Eteke ami yetiya iyaka patha karao tumi tetiya se'i pathara anusarana karaa
75|19|tara pichata iyara barnanara dayitba niscitabharae amarae'i.
75|20|Ketiya'o nahaya, baram tomaloke prthiraira jiranaka bhala poraa
75|21|arau tomaloke akhiraataka arahela karaa.
75|22|Se'idina kichumana mukhamandala ujjbala ha’ba
75|23|sihamta nija pratipalakara prati ca'i thakiba.
75|24|Arau se'idina kichumana mukhamandala bibarna hai paraiba
75|25|sihamte dharana karaiba ye, eta dhbansakarai biparyaya sihamtara oparata apatita ha’ba.
75|26|Niscaya, yetiya praana kanthagata ha’ba
75|27|arau koraa ha’ba, ‘kone taka raksa karaiba’
75|28|tetiya tara pratyeya ha’ba ye, e'itorae bidayaksana.
75|29|Arau bharaira lagata bharai jomta kha'i yaba.
75|30|Se'idina tomara pratipalakara ocarate'i sakaloke khedi niya ha’ba.
75|31|Eteke si bisbasa karaa na'i arau chalato adaya karaa na'i.
75|32|Baram si satya pratyakhyana karaichila arau mukha ghuraa'i laichila.
75|33|Tara pichata si ahankara karai nija paraiyalara ocaralai ubhati gaichila
75|34|durbhoga tomara babe arau durbhoga
75|35|akau durbhoga tomara babe arau durbhoga
75|36|manuhe bharae neki ye, taka ene'i erai diya ha’ba
75|37|si biryara sukrabindu nachilane, yito skhalita haya
75|38|tara pichata se'ito ‘alakbata’ parainata haya. Tara pichata allahe taka srsti karae arau suthama karae.
75|39|Tara pichata te'om tara paraa yora yora hicape nara-narai srsti karae.
75|40|Tathapi'o se'i srasta mrtaka punarjiraita karaibalai saksama nahayane barau
76|1|Kalaprabahata manuhara oparata ene eta samaya aha na'ine yetiya si ullekhayogya ekorae'i nachila
76|2|ami manuhaka srsti karaicho misra sukrabindura paraa, ami taka paraiksa karaima, seye ami taka sraranasakti arau drstisakti sampanna bana'icho.
76|3|Niscaya ami taka patha nirdesa dicho, haya si krtajna ha’ba, nahaya si akrtajna ha’ba.
76|4|Niscaya ami kaphirasakalara babe prastuta karai raakhicho sikali, galaberai arau lelihana ju'i.
76|5|Niscaya satkarmasilasakale pana karaiba ene purnapatrara paraa yara misrana ha’ba kaphura.
76|6|Enekuraa eta nijaraa ya’ra paraa allahara bandasakale pana karaiba, sihamte iyaka nija icchamate prabahita karaiba.
76|7|(Karana) sihamte mannata purana karae, arau se'i dinatoka bhaya karae yi dinatora akalyana ha’ba subistrta.
76|8|Sihamte khadyara prati asakti thaka sattbe'o abharagrasta, iyatima arau bandika khadya dana karae.
76|9|Sihamte kaya, ‘ami kerala allahara santustira uddesye tomalokaka khadya dana karao, ami tomalokara ocarata pratidana nibicarao arau krtajnata'o nibicarao.
76|10|Niscaya ami amara pratipalakara taraphara paraa eta bhayankara bhitiprada dirasara bhaya posana karao’.
76|11|Phalata allahe sihamtaka raksa karaiba se'i dinara anistara paraa arau sihamtaka pradana karaiba ujjbalata arau utphullata.
76|12|Arau sihamtara dhairyara puraskarasbaraupe te'om sihamtaka pradana karaiba udyana arau raecami bastra.
76|13|Tata sihamte susajjita asanata a'uji bahi thakiba, tata sihamte prakhara garama arau atyadhika sito anubhara nakaraiba.
76|14|Sihamtara oparata sannihita thakiba udyanara cham arau iyara phalamulara thokabora sihamtara sampurna ayattadhina karaa ha’ba.
76|15|Arau sihamtaka ghurai ghurai paraibesana karaa ha’ba raupara patrata arau phatikara darae sbaccha pana patrata
76|16|raupara subhra phatika patra, sihamte iyara paraimana karaiba sampurna paraimitabharae.
76|17|Arau tata sihamtaka pana karaoraa ha’ba sukana adara misraita purnapatra-paniya
76|18|Jannatara enekuraa eta nijaraa yara nama ha’ba chalachabila.
